sentences.en: All offered up sacrifices to the minion of fortune.
sentences.cn: 所有的人都情愿为这个命运的宠儿作出牺牲.

sentences.en: At worst some egregious minion had conducted a childish private enterprise.
sentences.cn: 这最多也不过是一批低能的小人物自己干的无聊把戏而已.

sentences.en: Bowing with the air of one accustomed to public praise, he stole to the cavern and ordered Hagar to come forth with a commanding, "What ho, minion!
sentences.cn: 他习以为常地躬身谢过，又轻轻走到洞穴，大模大样地命黑格出来：“呔！ 奴才！

sentences.en: Don’t fall into the trap of becoming a mindless minion.
sentences.cn: 不要掉进陷阱，成了没脑子的奴才。

sentences.en: Maybe that's because she's a minion of the anti - Christ.
sentences.cn: 也许因为这个小奴才不信基督教?

sentences.en: Non - combat pets now have the tag " Companion " instead of " Minion "
sentences.cn: 非 战斗宠物标记为 “ 伙伴”而非 “ 爪牙 ”

sentences.en: Undead Minion Once living humans, these wretched souls now reside in the depths of Hell.
sentences.cn: 一度是活着的人类, 这些不幸的灵魂现在居住在地狱的深处.

sentences.en: When you subscribe to a religion, you enroll in a mindless minion training program.
sentences.cn: 如果你信仰了某个宗教，就是加入了一个没脑子的奴才培训班。

trans.tran_cn: <贬>奴颜婢膝的仆从，走狗，宠儿， 受人崇拜者
